alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 9:47PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Norman and Traill Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Marshall, Kittson, Walsh and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Halstad. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 31.9 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
